query:
What are the required fields, field types, supporting documents, official submission method,
                    governing authority, target users, and submission deadlines for the form 1040 form?
                    Include official source URLs and detailed instructions.
answer: Form 1040 requires personal information, filing status, and income details. Submit by April 15, 2025. Use IRS website for the form and instructions.

Throughout these instructions, you are directed to go to the Instructions for Forms 1040 (also known as the Instructions for Form 1040 (and 1040-SR)) for details on how to complete a line. But, in most instances, you will need to look at whether you must take exceptions into consideration when applying those instructions. The specific exceptions for a line are listed under the instructions for the line. results.title: Form 1040: U.S. Individual Tax Return Definition, Types, and Use
results.content:
Form 1040 is available on the IRS website and has two pages that must be filled out. Form 1040 can be mailed in or e-filed. Tax filers are asked for their filing status along with their personal information, such as their name, address, Social Security number (some information on one's spouse may also be needed), and the number of their dependents.

The form also asks whether the taxpayer wishes to contribute $3 to presidential campaign funds. [...] Form 1040 is the central part of tax filing for United States citizens. It is the tax form that all taxpayer financial statements eventually feed into and support tax schedules branch out of. Regardless of an individual's filing status or income, taxpayers who file taxes will complete some version of Form 1040.

Internal Revenue Service. "1040 (and 1040-SR) Instructions," Pages 6, 8-9.

Internal Revenue Service. "Topic No. 407, Business Income." [...] ## Where Can I Find Form 1040?

Form 1040 is not a tax statement or form that gets distributed to taxpayers. Unlike a W-2 or 1099 statement that is mailed by an employer or party you've contracted with, Form 1040 is available for download on the IRS website. Free IRS filing platforms such as Free File Fillable Forms will provide digital copies. Some public courthouses or federal buildings in your community may offer paper copies available for pickup.

results.title: [PDF] 2024 Instruction 1040 - IRS
results.content:
File Form 1040 or 1040-SR by April 15, 2025. If you file after this date, you may have to pay interest and penalties. See Interest and Penalties, later.
If you were serving in, or in support of, the U.S. Armed Forces in a designa-ted combat zone or contingency opera-tion, you may be able to file later. See Pub. 3 for details.
CAUTION ! [...] later. [...] your family, or your business.

# About Form 1040, U.S. Individual Income Tax Return

### More In Forms and Instructions

Form 1040 is used by U.S. taxpayers to file an annual income tax return. [...] Form 1040-SR is available as an optional alternative to using Form 1040 for taxpayers who are age 65 or older. Form 1040-SR uses the same schedules and instructions as Form 1040 does.

## Current revision
